document.full_text: the daughter of a jailed former president faces the ex-army commander who tried to depose him in a presidential run-off on sunday after a bruising campaign to lead peru's young democracy and booming economy.
document.title: peru faces divisive election cliffhanger
lines_and_colors: the daughter of a jailed former president faces the ex-army commander who tried to depose him in a presidential run-off on sunday after a bruising campaign to lead peru's young democracy and booming economy.
